group_1.textCenter: What was that just now...? The school building...
(Was that a memory just now? [chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301701:cheek_0][chara:301701:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_200]No, that wasn’t @a memory.)
(A daydream that felt too real... A hallucination...@Or something like that.)
(But... The old school building is clearly intact.)
(Maybe I “peeked into another world” or “saw@the future”.)
(...If you force it into words, I guess I feel like@that.)
(...It's really dangerous to go in the old school@building?)
(Since the building is old, maybe there is a@chance that it will collapse...?)

group_1.textRight: I’m ready for the demonstration, so I'll wait in@the club room.

group_1.textLeft: Uh, that’s no good. You should evacuate@immediately.
...Nevermind.
Perhaps you'd like to take this chance to visit@the Student Council room?
Let’s have a cup of tea with Lilianna’s Student@Council while we wait.

group_1.textRight: Sure. Why don’t I take you up on the invitation?
The water leak got fixed, but most rooms still@off limits.
The rest of the clubs just went home.
The only one left is the Flower Arrangement Club...@Or rather, it's just me.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry to hear that! [chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301701:cheek_0][chara:301701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_100][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]Come to the Student@Council room, by all means!
(So the classrooms are empty... Now it’s just@this room that’s being used.)
(No one is left in the old school building...@It’s safe for the time being.)
Now, let’s go to the Student Council room.

group_1.textRight: Oh, right. I'll leave the club room's key in@your hands.
When tonight’s Moon-Viewing celebration is over...
Can you lock up and hand the key to the@security guard?

group_1.textLeft: Understood, I’ll keep it safe.
(...That’s right! I managed to avoid the@immediate crisis.)
(But the schedule after this is an issue.)
(We'll all go to the old building for the@demonstration and Moon-Viewing...!)
The old school building...

group_1.narration: I have a bad feeling about it...!

group_1.textLeft: (Even so... The idea of the old school building@suddenly collapsing...)
(Is it even possible?)
Was the old school building that old in the@first place...?

group_1.textRight: I was surprised as well, it was such a big@water leak.

group_1.textLeft: (Ah... I accidentally said that out loud.)
(It seems that she thought that I was talking@about the water leak.)

group_1.textRight: The big move to the new building might be@underway...
But it's not like the old building's about to@collapse.

group_1.textLeft: ...That’s right.
(Well, there are other possibilities... Maybe an@accident or a natural disaster...?
